name.description: Human-readable name of the agent project

description.description: Short summary of what the agent does

highlight.description: Key standout feature, differentiator, or notable capability that makes this agent unique

stars.description: GitHub stars, minimum required for inclusion

category.description: Primary category defining the agent's domain. Choose the most specific applicable category: commerce (e-commerce, shopping), payment (transactions, gateways), finance (analysis, trading), productivity (task mgmt, workflows), education (learning, tutoring), infra-tools (dev tools, APIs), meta-agents (orchestration), writing (content generation), research-and-analysis (data analysis, reports), lifestyle (personal, wellness), programming (code tools), art (creative tools), iot (hardware integration), data-visualization (charts, dashboards), social-media (platform automation), gaming (game dev, NPCs), workflow-automation (business processes), marketing (campaigns, SEO), communication (chat, collaboration), experimental (research-only projects)

principle.description: How it works or what tech it builds on

reusability.description: Notes on composability, plug-and-play, API support etc.

limitations.description: Known issues, coverage limits, or usage scope

open_source.description: Only true if LICENSE is clearly found or declared

useful_links.description: Important links from repository including demos, documentation, tutorials, live applications, API docs, community resources, or other valuable references
